channel.title: +Network on Vishvas's notes
channel.description: Recent content in +Network on Vishvas's notes

item.title: Cables
item.description: Types Cat 6 - 10 Gbps. 2x Performance of Cat 5 & 5e - frequency up to 250 MHz Cat 5e - 1Gbps Cat 5 - 100MBPs Conductor Shielding Indoor cables must overcome interference from other wires. So shielding is needed. Unshielded cables are generally ok for outdoor use. Types U/UTP (Unshielded Twisted Pair) means the cable consists of 4 unshielded twisted pairs and no outer shielding.

item.title: Wifi Router
item.description: Desiderata Have sufficient wireless speed. Be dual band Support new wifi protocols (eth ac > n) Protocols 802.11ax > 802.11ac (5GHz faster) > 802.11n (100Mbps) > 802.11g > 802.11b > 802.11a > 802.11 Bands 5GHz is faster but lower range. 2.4GHz is slower, but longer range. Older devices need it. wifi-router-history
